meanings.definition: A chronic disorder characterized by widespread musculoskeletal pain, fatigue, and tenderness in localized areas.
meanings.sent1: Fibromyalgia can cause pain all over the body.
meanings.sent2: She struggles with fibromyalgia, feeling tired and achy most days.
meanings.sent3: Even though fibromyalgia isn't contagious, her teddy bear seems to have caught it!
meanings.sent4: Living with fibromyalgia is like carrying a heavy burden of pain every day.
meanings.sent5: The constant ache of fibromyalgia is like a never-ending storm cloud over her.

meanings.definition: The presence of tender points on the body that are sensitive to pressure.
meanings.sent1: When she pressed on the tender points, the fibromyalgia pain flared up.
meanings.sent2: His doctor diagnosed him with fibromyalgia after finding multiple tender points.
meanings.sent3: Tickling someone with fibromyalgia on their tender points is definitely not a good idea!
meanings.sent4: The tender points of fibromyalgia are like hidden traps waiting to be triggered.
meanings.sent5: Her body felt like a minefield of fibromyalgia tender points, each one a potential source of pain.
